EmailTemplate.name: 2019 HAI HELI-EXPO.2019 HAI HELI-EXPO Invitation_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: You Make the (Video) Call at HAI Heli-Expo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> YOUR EXCLUSIVE INVITATION TO VIDEOCONFERENCE USING HONEYWELL’S ASPIRE® 200 SATCOM HAI HELI-EXPO 2019 Visit us at HAI Heli-Expo 2019 to try out Honeywell’s breakthrough satellite communications technology for helicopters, the Aspire 200.
Just look for the Honeywell logo and stop in to see us at Booth #C3107 for a free demonstration of the best videoconferencing capability flying.
Aspire 200 is what helicopter SATCOM was always meant to be – fast, reliable and always available to deliver a connected-helicopter experience comparable to what you get on the ground. Global coverage over water and in remote locations. High data rates. Beyond line-of-sight capabilities. No rotor-blade interference. It’s all there! And don’t forget to visit the static display area to see how we’re helping SNC® breathe new life into the Sierra Force UH-60 Black Hawk with the Aspire 200, Sky Connect® Tracker III mission-management system, 36-150 auxiliary power unit and much more.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019-HAI-HELI-EXPO.html]]>
See you in Atlanta!
Honeywell Aerospace Events Team
